Hello
So this is not my first time i burn games to xbox so i know the basics.
But now when i burn with img burn and i insert the game it doesnt work it just says play DVD and then if i press A it goes to xbox logo, so i patch it to wawe 3 burn it and it does the same so what now?Do i need to patch it on some other else wawe or what?

If you have 1.5 firmware, wave isn't important, it's the update to the dashboard to make it compatible with the new wave you need. 1.5 ignores wave completely but I never go on Live! or plug-in the cat5 for that matter unless I've swapped in the stock disc drive. You can avoid even going on Live! though by downloading the update from M$ website. If you do a Google search for the latest update you can throw it on the root of a usb drive & just plug it into your 360. Boot it and it should do the rest.
I was having the same problem with Assassins Creed II. I burned 6 coasters before I realized it had to be something other than the wave format. As soon as I updated the dashboard via Live! all 5 of the 6 coasters worked just fine.
